main event: Multiple civilians reported sightings of a UFO over Lake City, Pennsylvania during February 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped with hazy edges, appearing white to golden in color., One report indicated a round, disc-shaped craft with a brightly lit dome and a flashing red light., The object was observed hovering for several minutes, moving in circular patterns, then speeding away., Witnesses claimed the object remained visible for approximately 15 to 20 minutes before disappearing., Local citizens described seeing a small light object hovering about a cloud that appeared suddenly and disappeared just as quickly.
sighted object: one round disc-shaped craft or luminous object in the sky
